analysis.description:
Reentrancy in TokenVesting.release (/unique_chucks/5/0x3e2a607b12a002cc4b6cfe9d04f14436b13ad4ee.sol#340-347):
	External calls:
	- unreleased = releasableAmount(token) (/unique_chucks/5/0x3e2a607b12a002cc4b6cfe9d04f14436b13ad4ee.sol#340-341)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- released (/unique_chucks/5/0x3e2a607b12a002cc4b6cfe9d04f14436b13ad4ee.sol#341-343)

Reentrancy in TokenVesting.revoke (/unique_chucks/5/0x3e2a607b12a002cc4b6cfe9d04f14436b13ad4ee.sol#359-369):
	External calls:
	- balance = token.balanceOf(this) (/unique_chucks/5/0x3e2a607b12a002cc4b6cfe9d04f14436b13ad4ee.sol#361-363)
	- unreleased = releasableAmount(token) (/unique_chucks/5/0x3e2a607b12a002cc4b6cfe9d04f14436b13ad4ee.sol#363)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- revoked (/unique_chucks/5/0x3e2a607b12a002cc4b6cfe9d04f14436b13ad4ee.sol#364-367)

TalaoMarketplace.buy (/unique_chucks/5/0x3e2a607b12a002cc4b6cfe9d04f14436b13ad4ee.sol#133-141) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(msg.sender,amount) (/unique_chucks/5/0x3e2a607b12a002cc4b6cfe9d04f14436b13ad4ee.sol#136-140)

TalaoMarketplace.sell (/unique_chucks/5/0x3e2a607b12a002cc4b6cfe9d04f14436b13ad4ee.sol#148-159) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transferFrom(msg.sender,this,amount) (/unique_chucks/5/0x3e2a607b12a002cc4b6cfe9d04f14436b13ad4ee.sol#151-152)

TalaoMarketplace.withdrawTalao (/unique_chucks/5/0x3e2a607b12a002cc4b6cfe9d04f14436b13ad4ee.sol#183-197) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(msg.sender,tokens) (/unique_chucks/5/0x3e2a607b12a002cc4b6cfe9d04f14436b13ad4ee.sol#193-197)

Crowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/5/0x3e2a607b12a002cc4b6cfe9d04f14436b13ad4ee.sol#464-475) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(beneficiary,tokens) (/unique_chucks/5/0x3e2a607b12a002cc4b6cfe9d04f14436b13ad4ee.sol#473)

TalaoCrowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/5/0x3e2a607b12a002cc4b6cfe9d04f14436b13ad4ee.sol#1428-1442) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(beneficiary,tokens) (/unique_chucks/5/0x3e2a607b12a002cc4b6cfe9d04f14436b13ad4ee.sol#1437)

TalaoCrowdsale.finalization (/unique_chucks/5/0x3e2a607b12a002cc4b6cfe9d04f14436b13ad4ee.sol#1464-1529) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(timelockedTokensContracts[advisorsWallet],3000000000000000000000000) (/unique_chucks/5/0x3e2a607b12a002cc4b6cfe9d04f14436b13ad4ee.sol#1490-1496)
	-token.mint(timelockedTokensContracts[foundersWallet1],4000000000000000000000000) (/unique_chucks/5/0x3e2a607b12a002cc4b6cfe9d04f14436b13ad4ee.sol#1496-1498)
	-token.mint(timelockedTokensContracts[foundersWallet2],4000000000000000000000000) (/unique_chucks/5/0x3e2a607b12a002cc4b6cfe9d04f14436b13ad4ee.sol#1499-1504)
	-token.mint(timelockedTokensContracts[foundersWallet3],4000000000000000000000000) (/unique_chucks/5/0x3e2a607b12a002cc4b6cfe9d04f14436b13ad4ee.sol#1504-1505)
	-token.mint(shareholdersWallet,6000000000000000000000000) (/unique_chucks/5/0x3e2a607b12a002cc4b6cfe9d04f14436b13ad4ee.sol#1505-1506)
	-token.mint(reserveWallet,29000000000000000000000000) (/unique_chucks/5/0x3e2a607b12a002cc4b6cfe9d04f14436b13ad4ee.sol#1512-1513)
	-token.mint(timelockedTokensContracts[futureRoundWallet],toMint) (/unique_chucks/5/0x3e2a607b12a002cc4b6cfe9d04f14436b13ad4ee.sol#1516)
	-token.finishMinting() (/unique_chucks/5/0x3e2a607b12a002cc4b6cfe9d04f14436b13ad4ee.sol#1518-1520)

TalaoCrowdsale.buyTokensPresale (/unique_chucks/5/0x3e2a607b12a002cc4b6cfe9d04f14436b13ad4ee.sol#1446-1462) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(beneficiary,tokens) (/unique_chucks/5/0x3e2a607b12a002cc4b6cfe9d04f14436b13ad4ee.sol#1459)
	-token.mint(timelockedTokensContracts[beneficiary],timelockedTokens) (/unique_chucks/5/0x3e2a607b12a002cc4b6cfe9d04f14436b13ad4ee.sol#1459-1461)

ProgressiveIndividualCappedCrowdsale.getCurrentEthCapPerAddress (/unique_chucks/5/0x3e2a607b12a002cc4b6cfe9d04f14436b13ad4ee.sol#742-753) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp < startGeneralSale (/unique_chucks/5/0x3e2a607b12a002cc4b6cfe9d04f14436b13ad4ee.sol#745-746)

Crowdsale.rate should be constant (/unique_chucks/5/0x3e2a607b12a002cc4b6cfe9d04f14436b13ad4ee.sol#419-421)
TalaoCrowdsale.baseEthCapPerAddress should be constant (/unique_chucks/5/0x3e2a607b12a002cc4b6cfe9d04f14436b13ad4ee.sol#1298-1299)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/5/0x3e2a607b12a002cc4b6cfe9d04f14436b13ad4ee.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.23 (/unique_chucks/5/0x3e2a607b12a002cc4b6cfe9d04f14436b13ad4ee.sol#1): it allows old versions
